response.overview: The pickers. The players. The Singers. The songwriters. The storytellers.The String bands. The hometowns. The hand me downs. The hall of famers. The up-and-comers. The melodies. The memories. The moments. The twangy two-finger tunes that define who we are. And where we are. The music we call Country in the Carolinas. Only on PBS Charlotte.  Featuring music by: The Avett Brothers, Jim Avett, The Banknotes, The Briar-hoppers, Don Gibson, Rhiannon Giddens, Joe Lasher, Jack Lawrence, Mark O'Conner, Earl Scruggs, Arthur "Guitar Boogie" Smith, Steep Canyon Rangers, The Trailblazers, Doc Watson, Lee Ann Womack.  Bonus Footage.  Live performances by: The Briarhoppers, The Trailblazers, The Banknotes
response.tagline: It's the soundtrack of the south.  Our Life in lyrics.
response.title: Country in the Carolinas
